00028 #ifndef RANDOMCELLKILLER_HPP_
00029 #define RANDOMCELLKILLER_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include "AbstractCellKiller.hpp"
00032 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00033 
00034 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00035 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00036 
00037 
00050 template<unsigned DIM>
00051 class RandomCellKiller : public AbstractCellKiller<DIM>
00052 {
00053 private:
00054 
00059      double mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour;
00060 
00062     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00074     template<class Archive>
00075     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00076     {
00077         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCellKiller<DIM> >(*this);
00078 
00079         // Make sure the random number generator is archived
00080         RandomNumberGenerator* p_random_generator = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00081         archive & *p_random_generator;
00082         archive & p_random_generator;
00083     }
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00093     RandomCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation, double probabilityOfDeathInAnHour);
00094 
00098     double GetDeathProbabilityInAnHour() const;
00099 
00105     void TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(CellPtr pCell);
00106 
00111     void TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath();
00112 
00118     void OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00119 };
00120 
00121 #include "SerializationExportWrapper.hpp"
00122 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS_SAME_DIMS(RandomCellKiller)
00123 
00124 namespace boost
00125 {
00126 namespace serialization
00127 {
00131 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00132 inline void save_construct_data(
00133     Archive & ar, const RandomCellKiller<DIM> * t, const BOOST_PFTO unsigned int file_version)
00134 {
00135     // Save data required to construct instance
00136     const AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* const p_cell_population = t->GetCellPopulation();
00137     ar << p_cell_population;
00138     double prob = t->GetDeathProbabilityInAnHour();
00139     ar << prob;
00140 }
00141 
00145 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00146 inline void load_construct_data(
00147     Archive & ar, RandomCellKiller<DIM> * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00148 {
00149     // Retrieve data from archive required to construct new instance
00150     AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* p_cell_population;
00151     ar >> p_cell_population;
00152     double prob;
00153     ar >> prob;
00154 
00155     // Invoke inplace constructor to initialise instance
00156     ::new(t)RandomCellKiller<DIM>(p_cell_population, prob);
00157 }
00158 }
00159 } // namespace ...
